b.span: Find learning packets, resources, links to online learning, WiFi access sites, schedules for free meals, and more

span.b: Additional WiFi Access Announced April 1st - View locations and schedules HERE.

div.p: Beginning April 1, 2020, Laurens County School District #55 will be placing WiFi equipped school buses at various locations for students to access the internet and internet-based classroom materials.

div.div: In response to Governor Henry McMaster's plans for dealing with COVID-19, all schools in South Carolina are closed through April 30, 2020. This closure includes the cancellation of all school-related activities. Laurens County School District #55 (LCSD 55) is committed to providing students and parents with instructional resources throughout the duration of the closure. In addition to instructional resources, the school district is providing free meals, free WiFi access, and a Chromebook for each student in grades three through twelve. These are uncharted waters and we appreciate your cooperation and patience as we all work together through this time.

a.title: Visit Learning Packets and Resources Page

span.data-emptytext: Laurens County School District 55 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value: Laurens County School District 55 is committed to ensuring that its website is accessible to students, parents and members of the community with disabilities. Learn more about our Website Accessibility.

p.span:
Laurens County School District 55 is committed to ensuring that its website is accessible to students, parents and members of the community with disabilities.
Learn more about our Website Accessibility.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
